page.title: 11Science and Technology
page.content: The science and technology of the area revolves around the High School.The first computer was introduced in 1982 and in 1985 a specialist computer room was built with a network of fifteen computers,to meet the growing demand. The school has courses from C.S.E.to "O" level and the more specialised "A" level.According to the Joint Matriculation Board their syllabus aims to create in pupils "an awareness of the impact of computers on society and of their role in commerce, industry and management." Other departments within the school, such as History, also use the computers to aid teaching.A night school class of micro- computers for beginners is mostly attended by the older generation who feel "out of touch" with today's society.
